title: netgear d6220_firmware 栈缓冲区溢出
description: This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of NETGEAR R6400 and R6700 firmware version 1.0.4.98 routers. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the upnpd service, which listens on UDP port 1900 by default. A crafted MX header field in an SSDP message can trigger an overflow of a fixed-length stack-based buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-11851.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

cwe.cwe_description: 栈缓冲区溢出

description: A vulnerability in the authentication for the general purpose APIs implementation of Cisco Email Security Appliance (ESA), Cisco Content Security Management Appliance (SMA), and Cisco Web Security Appliance (WSA) could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to access general system information and certain configuration information from an affected device. The vulnerability exists because a secure authentication token is not required when authenticating to the general purpose API. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted request for information to the general purpose API on an affected device. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to obtain system and configuration information from the affected device, resulting in an unauthorized information disclosure.

title: kdelibs本地密码泄漏漏洞
description:
KDELibs是创建在Qt框架之上，它提供框架和众多功能来开发KDE软体的基础库。

KDE在遇到"internal server error"时会打印出包含错误信息的URL，其中有可能包含资源所在的用户名和密码，如显示累死"https://user:password@...otehost.com"的信息。由于'kioslave/http/http.cpp'使用了m_request.url.url()而非sanitized m_request.url.prettyUrl()造成的。攻击者可以利用漏洞获得敏感信息。
solution:
用户可参考如下厂商提供的安全公告获得补丁信息：
https://projects.kde.org/projects/kde/kdelibs/repository/revisions/65d736dab592bced4410ccfa4699de89f78c96ca/diff/kioslave/http/http.cpp

title: Pidgin up to 2.6.1 XMPP Protocol Plugin Crash 拒绝服务漏洞
description: 在2.6.2之前的Pidgin中的libpurple中的XMPP协议插件在尝试获取自定义微笑期间没有正确处理错误IQ节，这允许远程攻击者通过XHTML-IM内容与CID：图像导致拒绝服务（应用程序崩溃）。
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: ZixForum 'Zixforum.mdb' 远程密码安全信息泄露漏洞
description: ZixForum 1.14 and earlier stores sensitive information under the web root with insufficient access control, which allows remote attackers to download a database containing passwords via a direct request for Zixforum.mdb.  NOTE: a followup post suggests that this issue only occurs if the administrator does not properly follow installation directions.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: FFmpeg 3.3.3 libavformat/mvdec.c mv_read_header 资源管理漏洞
description: 在FFmpeg 3.3.3中的libavformat / mvdec.c中，由于缺少EOF (End of File)检查，mv_read_header()中的DoS可能会导致巨大的CPU和内存消耗。当提供一个精心设计的MV文件，它声称标题中有一个大的“nb_frames”字段但没有包含足够的后备数据时，帧上的循环会消耗巨大的CPU和内存资源，因为循环内部没有EOF检查。
solution:
厂商已发布漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/commit/4f05e2e2dc1a89f38cd9f0960a6561083d714f1e

title: ad-ldap-connector跨站请求伪造漏洞
description: ad-ldap-connector's admin panel before version 5.0.13 does not provide csrf protection, which when exploited may result in remote code execution or confidential data loss. CSRF exploits may occur if the user visits a malicious page containing CSRF payload on the same machine that has access to the ad-ldap-connector admin console via a browser. You may be affected if you use the admin console included with ad-ldap-connector versions <=5.0.12. If you do not have ad-ldap-connector admin console enabled or do not visit any other public URL while on the machine it is installed on, you are not affected. The issue is fixed in version 5.0.13.

NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2008-2079.

title: Libpng png_decompress_chunk()函数拒绝服务漏洞
description: libpng是一个可对PNG图形文件实现创建、读写等操作的PNG参考库。libpng库的png_decompress_chunk()函数在处理包含有高压缩比的辅助数据块的PNG文件时可能会消耗大量的CPU时间和内存，这种资源耗尽可能导致使用libpng库的应用挂起。PNG格式使用高效的压缩方式来存储图形数据和辅助数据库中的一些相关数据。PNG规范没有限制块的数量，将其大小限制于2.147G(2，147，483，647字节)。类似的，规范将图形的宽度和高度限制到21亿4700万行和21亿4700万列。由于deflate压缩方式可以非常高效的压缩仅由多次重复的单字节组成的数据流，很小的PNG文件在解压时可能会占用很大的内存，形成耗尽所有可用内存的\"解压炸弹\"。例如，对于包含有50，000行且每行都包含有100个字母Z的zTXt块，压缩后大约为17k字节，但解压后为5M，压缩比约为300：1。Libpng库在展开压缩的zTXt、iTXt和iCCP辅助数据块时使用了低效率的内存获取方式，图形文件中所包含的大约为50k畸形iCCP块可以解压到60M，这会将浏览器挂起约20分钟，精心创建的恶意块还可能将浏览器挂起更长时间，耗尽所有可用的内存。
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

A successful exploit could allow the attacker to access the web-based management interface with administrator privileges.
